actions.committee: Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend the Land and Water Conservation Fund Act of 1965.
short_title: Land and Water Conservation Fund Amendments Act

summary.text: Land and Water Conservation Fund Amendments Act - Increases the authorization of appropriations for the Land and Water Conservation Fund from $200,000,000 to $1,000,000,000 for each fiscal year through 1989. (Amends 16 U.S.C. 460l - 4 to 11)

titles.title: Land and Water Conservation Fund Amendments Act
A bill to amend the Land and Water Conservation Fund Act of 1965.
